File /std/shops/inherit/object_expressions.c

This is the file with all the functions that get information about objects. All of these methods assume they are called with the following data: seller, objects

Written by Pinkfish

Started Fri Jun 1 21:37:14 PDT 2001

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/player_handler.h and /include/expressions.h
